def get_suppliers_by_item(item):
    """
    Get all suppliers linked to a given Item.
    """
    suppliers = frappe.db.sql("""
        SELECT name, supplier 
        FROM `tabItem Supplier`
        WHERE parent = %s
    """, item, as_dict=True)

    frappe.response['message'] = suppliers

name: Unlock RFQ after record submitted
script:
def unlock_rfq_after_submit(rfq_name):
    rfq = frappe.get_doc("Request for Quotation", rfq_name)
    if rfq.docstatus != 1:
        frappe.throw("Only submitted RFQs can be unlocked.")

    # Instead of a new field â†’ downgrade docstatus temporarily
    rfq.db_set("docstatus", 0)
    
    
    # Downgrade all child table rows (if needed)
    # Child table doctype: "Request for Quotation Item"
    for item in rfq.items:  # "items" is default fieldname for child table
        item.db_set("docstatus", 0)  # ensures db reflects draft
        
    frappe.response['message'] = True

    
rfq_name = frappe.form_dict.get("rfq_name","")

unlock_rfq_after_submit(rfq_name)

name: Auto Create Child Tasks For Task
script:
"""Create subtasks for each employee listed in custom_assigned_to."""
if not doc.parent_task:
    
    if not doc.parent_task and doc.custom_assigned_to:
        # Collect all employee IDs from the child table
        employee_list = [row.employee for row in doc.custom_assigned_to if row.employee]
        
        if len(employee_list) > 1:
            sub_task_list = []
            
            for row in employee_list:
                employee = row
                if employee:
                    # Fetch user and employee details
                    employee_data = frappe.db.get_value(
                        "Employee", 
                        employee, 
                        ["user_id", "employee_name", "name"],
                        as_dict=True
                    )
                    
                    user = employee_data.user_id if employee_data else None
                    employee_name = employee_data.employee_name if employee_data else employee
                    employee_id = employee_data.name if employee_data else employee
                    
                    # Skip if subtask already exists for this employee
                    existing = frappe.db.sql("""
                        SELECT t.name 
                        FROM `tabTask` t
                        INNER JOIN `tabTask Employee` c ON c.parent = t.name
                        WHERE t.parent_task = %s AND c.employee = %s
                    """, (doc.name, employee), as_dict=True)
                    
                    if existing:
                        continue
                
                    # Build subtask subject (append employee name)
                    base_subject = doc.subject.split(' - ')[0]
                    subtask_subject = f"{base_subject} - {employee_name}"
                    
                    # Truncate subject if it exceeds 140 characters
                    if len(subtask_subject) > 140:
                        subtask_subject = subtask_subject[:137] + "..."
                        
                    # Create subtask
                    subtask = frappe.new_doc("Task")
                    subtask.subject = subtask_subject
                    subtask.description = doc.description
                    subtask.project = doc.project
                    subtask.type = doc.type
                    
                    subtask.priority = doc.priority
                    subtask.task_weight = doc.task_weight
                    subtask.exp_start_date = doc.exp_start_date
                    subtask.exp_end_date = doc.exp_end_date
                    
                    subtask.expected_time = doc.expected_time
                    subtask.description = doc.description
                    subtask.exp_start_date = doc.exp_start_date
                    subtask.exp_end_date = doc.exp_end_date
                    
                    subtask.status = "Open"
                    subtask.append("custom_assigned_to", {"employee": employee_id})
                    subtask.insert(ignore_permissions=True)
                    
                    # Add subtask name for later parent update
                    sub_task_list.append(subtask.name)
                    
                    # Mark main task as group
                    doc.db_set("is_group", 1, update_modified=False)

                    # Assign ToDo for user if available
                    if user:
                        todo = frappe.get_doc({
                            "doctype": "ToDo",
                            "description": f"Auto-assigned from parent task {doc.name}",
                            "reference_type": "Task",
                            "reference_name": subtask.name,
                            "allocated_to": user,
                            "assigned_by": frappe.session.user
                        })
                        todo.insert(ignore_permissions=True)

            # âœ… Update parent_task for all created subtasks
            if sub_task_list:
                for sub_name in sub_task_list:
                    sub_doc = frappe.get_doc("Task", sub_name)
                    sub_doc.db_set("parent_task", doc.name, update_modified=False)
                    
        elif len(employee_list) == 1:
            
            for employee in employee_list:
                if employee:
                    # Fetch user and employee details
                    employee_data = frappe.db.get_value(
                        "Employee", 
                        employee, 
                        ["user_id", "employee_name", "name"],
                        as_dict=True
                    )
                    
                    if employee_data:
                        todo = frappe.get_doc({
                            "doctype": "ToDo",
                            "description": f"Auto-assigned from parent task {doc.name}",
                            "reference_type": "Task",
                            "reference_name": doc.name,
                            "allocated_to": employee_data.user_id,
                            "assigned_by": frappe.session.user
                        })
                        todo.insert(ignore_permissions=True)

name: Send Task For Approval
script:
"""
Automatically create Task Approval records when a Task workflow becomes 'Pending'.
For each assigned employee, the approval hierarchy is followed via 'custom_task_approver'.
If any employee in the chain has no approver, the system throws an error.
If an approver is self (same employee), the approval chain stops at that point.
"""


if doc.workflow_state == "Pending":

    # Collect employees from custom_assigned_to child table
    assigned_employees = [row.employee for row in doc.custom_assigned_to if row.employee]

    if assigned_employees:
        for emp in assigned_employees:
            task_emp =emp

            visited = set()
            current_emp = emp
            level = 1

            while current_emp:
                # Stop if already processed (avoid duplicate chain)
                if current_emp in visited:
                    break
                visited.add(current_emp)

                emp_doc = frappe.db.get_value(
                    "Employee",
                    current_emp,
                    ["custom_task_approver", "employee_name"],
                    as_dict=True,
                )
                

                emp_details = frappe.db.get_value(
                    "Employee",
                    task_emp,
                    ["name", "employee_name"],
                    as_dict=True,
                )
                
                approver = emp_doc.custom_task_approver

                employee_name = emp_doc.employee_name or current_emp
                
                approver_details = frappe.db.get_value(
                    "Employee",
                    approver,
                    ["name","user_id", "employee_name"],
                    as_dict=True,
                )

                if not emp_doc:
                    frappe.throw(f"Employee record not found for {current_emp}.")
                    break

                

                # Stop if no approver assigned
                if not approver:
                    frappe.throw(
                        f"The employee '{employee_name}' in the approval chain does not have an approver assigned. Please update their record."
                    )

                # Stop if approver already in visited (duplicate chain)
                if approver in visited:
                    break

                # Create Task Approval record
                task_approval = frappe.new_doc("Task Approval")
                task_approval.task = doc.name
                task_approval.employee = emp_details.name
                task_approval.approver = approver_details.name
                task_approval.emp_name = emp_details.employee_name
                task_approval.approver_name = approver_details.employee_name
                task_approval.approval_level = level
                task_approval.insert(ignore_permissions=True)

                if level == 1:
                    frappe.db.set_value("Task Approval", task_approval.name, "workflow_state", "Pending")
                
                if approver:
                    
                    todo = frappe.get_doc({
                        "doctype": "ToDo",
                        "description": f"Auto-assigned",
                        "reference_type": "Task Approval",
                        "reference_name": task_approval.name,
                        "allocated_to": approver_details.user_id,
                        "assigned_by": frappe.session.user
                    })
                    todo.insert(ignore_permissions=True)

                frappe.msgprint(
                    f"âœ… Created Task Approval Level {level}: {employee_name} â†’ {approver or 'None'}"
                )

                # Stop if self-approver
                if approver == current_emp:
                    frappe.msgprint(f"ðŸ”¹ Approval flow stopped â€” {employee_name} is self approver.")
                    break

                # Move to next approver
                current_emp = approver
                level = level + 1

name: Validate Task Status
script:
# Skip if this task is a child task (parent_status check happens for parent only)
if not doc.is_group:
    # Check if parent exists
    if doc.parent_task:
        parent_task = frappe.get_doc("Task", doc.parent_task)

        # Get all child tasks of this parent
        child_tasks = frappe.get_all(
            "Task",
            filters={"parent_task": doc.parent_task},
            fields=["status"]
        )

        # If all child tasks are complete
        if all(c.status == "Completed" for c in child_tasks):
            parent_task.status = "Completed"
            parent_task.completed_on = frappe.utils.nowdate()
            parent_task.save(ignore_permissions=True)

if doc.is_group and doc.status == "Completed":
    # Get all child tasks
    child_tasks = frappe.get_all(
        "Task",
        filters={"parent_task": doc.name},
        fields=["status"]
    )

    # Check if any child task is not complete
    if any(c.status != "Complete" for c in child_tasks):
        frappe.throw("Parent tasks cannot be marked Complete until all child tasks are complete.")
